attributes.additional_details:
Aminal aid have highlighted the cruel slaughter of sheep which end there days in a dreadful state. I call upon the govenment to ban the halal slaughter of animals in the UK. Kosher meat is killed without suffering to the animal so to is "normal" meat I eat. I do not want to be told what I can eat namely going to a place to eat to be told its all Halal.

This is a horrid way to kill an animal without total respect for an animal that will provide food. I am asking that Halal meat slaughtered in the UK be banned.
